passive.name: Rough Water
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. The Break DMG dealt by the wearer ignores <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of the target's DEF. When the wearer's Break Effect in battle is at {{2, percent}}% or greater, increases their SPD by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong>.
